nodes.text: Junia Tavrak was a Human female who served the Sith Empire during the Galactic War.

During the Empire's invasion on Corellia, Tavrak ordered Randun Ard and his squad of mercenaries to eliminate a group of rebelling CorSec officers. However, when all except Randun were killed in an ambush, Junia tasked an Imperial team to stop the attackers despite Randun's protest.
